Title: Crossroads of Twilight
Description:
We need to take the Veneration Grounds back from the kobyss. 

Push them back and pave a bloody path through them.

We need to stop whatever is happening at the Eternal Flame! If they manage to corrupt it like they did at the tower... I don't even want to imagine what will happen.
ObjectivesText: Kill 15 kobyss attackers in the Venerations Grounds in Hallowfall.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet your allies in the Veneration Grounds in Hallowfall.
RewardText: Now we just need to deal with the shield.
